allProducts.name: Black Bean Quinoa Bowl
allProducts.shortDescription: This black bean and quinoa bowl has many of the usual hallmarks of a taco salad, minus the fried bowl.
allProducts.description: This black bean and quinoa bowl has many of the usual hallmarks of a taco salad, minus the fried bowl. We've loaded it up with pico de gallo, fresh cilantro and avocado plus an easy hummus dressing to drizzle on top.

allProducts.name: Roasted Root Veggies & Greens over Spiced Lentils
allProducts.shortDescription: Keep it vegan or add a drizzle of plain yogurt for extra richness.
allProducts.description: This earthy bowl of lentils bursting with Middle Eastern flavors is topped with leftover roasted root veggies from a large batch for an easy weeknight dinner. Keep it vegan or add a drizzle of plain yogurt for extra richness.

allProducts.name: Curried Sweet Potato & Peanut Soup
allProducts.shortDescription: In this flavorful soup recipe, sweet potatoes simmer in a quick coconut curry, resulting in a creamy, thick broth punctuated by notes of garlic and ginger.
allProducts.description: In this flavorful soup recipe, sweet potatoes simmer in a quick coconut curry, resulting in a creamy, thick broth punctuated by notes of garlic and ginger. We love peanuts for their inexpensive price and versatile flavor. They're also a great source of protein--1 ounce has 7 grams

allProducts.name: Barclay
allProducts.shortDescription: Itâ€™s like having a dessert in a glass with all that yummy whipped cream and chocolate ice cream! Truly delicious.
allProducts.description: Combined coffee liqueur, brandy, ice cream and double cream in a tall glass. Stirred until smooth. Topped with the dairy free whipped cream. Grated and sprinkled the vegan chocolate on top.

allProducts.name: Momo Special
allProducts.shortDescription: This cocktail with a handful of fresh mint makes it a perfect, if somewhat a labour-intensive drink for hot weather.

allProducts.name: August Moon
allProducts.shortDescription: There are many versions of August Moon, but this creation gives it a seasonal twist that makes the cocktail even more delicious.
allProducts.description: There are many versions of August Moon, but this creation gives it a seasonal twist that makes the cocktail even more delicious. The use of fresh ingredients makes the flavours intense, refreshing and fruity.
